title.rendered: LINK Modular Seating Unit- Straight Seat, No Arms, With Backrest

content.rendered:
The LINK Range of modular seating enables you to completely transform any space, any venue and in any style.

Available in a wide range of fabrics from Bradbury Blenheim as well as many other ranges (POA) you can truly customise your space by way of layout, colours and design.

Perfect for busy spaces such as airport lounges, hotels and waiting areas.

(Seat depth – 470mm)
